body.name: Gas Stove Knobs Locks, Aukfa Child Proofing Oven Knob Lock (6 Pack) (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 28 mins
features: Upgraded Aukfa childproof stove knob Locks, Unlike all other stove knob Covers in the market,It can be used without unscrewing the knob Covers. Aukfa child-proof safety locks prevent babies from opening gas stove and getting accidental injuries when exploring the house.They are easy to use, put in or pull out.
Child-proof stove knob protectors are built with heat-resistant plastic. The design is simple but built-tough to last with textured bumps for better grip and blends in with your appliance.

Aukfa stove protectors are made to be both safe and easy to use. Just as easy it is to secure the knobs, it’s also just as easy to take off when it comes time to use the stove. These stove knob protectors will fit most. But there is no way for your child or pet to open it.

Please measure the stove knob gap before purchase, The clearance below the gas stove knob from the stove needs to be 0.17inch to 0.46inch within this range. No drill installation needed, simply slide the proof lock behind the knob to secure knob from turning.
Each package includes 6 pack baby proof stove locks that come with 1 year warranty. If you have any questions or concerns, please send us a message and we would gladly assist you.
body.description: Gas Stove Knobs Locks, Aukfa Child Proofing Oven Knob Lock (6 Pack) (Black)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not childproof,I’d say resistant ,but works
reviews.reviewText: I like them,they work for me,I had a problem with the gas knobs getting accidentally turned on by “I didn’t do it”,who is apparently my 5th child I gave birth too.😉Anyhoo, they come on and off fairly easily,so sure a toddler could figure it out. A simple lesson on consequences for taking them off should fix that right up! It was the best option for me,I don’t have full time little ones in the house. They do sell things that cover the whole entire burner,but they are very bulky and in many cases would cover up the dial numbers as well. Just something to think about before you decide. Hope this helps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these after my dog decided to attempt to eat something off the stove and turned the gas knob. 😳 These are easy to install as it just slides right behind the knob on the stove. I’d recommend if you have a dog that does this or even as child proofing! The plastic is quality and doesn’t allow the knob to turn when it is in place. It’s a good alternative to covering the whole knob with the bulky ones that are also offered for child proofing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kept the cats from turning on my stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These locks work great for the stove. They lock down well on the handles and prevent children and CATS from turning your knobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are finicky. If you don’t put them on just right, they don’t work properly and your oven knobs can still move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Returned does not fit smart oven knobs
reviews.reviewText: Had to return was bummed because I thought they were universal but for smart ovens apparently not. Be sure to make sure your oven is not of new tech being smart one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Motorhome safeguard
reviews.reviewText: These guards were easy to install and provide the extra protection we needed. We installed these in our motorhome to keep us from accidentally knocking the burners on as we drove down the road. They are a perfect solution for both this and as a child safety mechanism.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Go too low snap off when open oven
reviews.reviewText: Snapped off all the knobs when oven door was opened and then the stopper flew into oven and down a crevice that cannot be reached by the heat element and now plastic burns and smells up our house every time we use oven.
